t: Why Magic Brands Is No Longer on Amazon
s: We wanted to let you know that The Magic Box 2.0 & The Magic Link are no longer listed on Amazon—and we want to explain why. Lately, we’ve seen a flood of low-quality, counterfeit products (often from overseas) posing as The Magic Box 2.0 & The Magic Link.
